meanings.sent1: The smell of freshly baked cookies was irresistible to me.
meanings.sent2: The puppy's cute face was irresistible to everyone in the room.
meanings.sent3: The idea of staying up all night to watch movies was irresistible.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like an irresistible melody that filled the room.
meanings.sent5: The temptation to eat the entire cake was simply irresistible.

meanings.definition: Having an overpowering appeal or attraction.
meanings.sent1: The shiny new toy was irresistible to the child.
meanings.sent2: The singer's voice was so irresistible that the audience couldn't stop cheering.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a spontaneous road trip was simply irresistible.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky with irresistible colors.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh flowers was an irresistible invitation to stop and enjoy nature.
